<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{cageId}/public-key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches the public key of a cage.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"cageId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Id of the collaboration space"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
